description.value:
Special: Shocking, Recharge

Note: Tip recharges after hit. During recharge counts as Cavalry Spear. (Requires Weapon Training for Primitive and Shocking) Can rearm with spare tips, takes two full actions which can't be sped up. User must stand still and has +30 to be hit during this time.
